ygData.subject: Re: Azog an' Oogog
ygData.msgSnippet: i am now lvl 19; my 1hs skill is 100, and my 2hs skill is about 92. i repeatedly change positions in fights to try to remedy my poor hit rate, i have still
ygData.messageBody:
i am now lvl 19; my 1hs skill is 100, and my 2hs skill is about 92. i
repeatedly change positions in fights to try to remedy my poor hit rate, i
have still fought entire battles where i have not landed a single blow. on
questioning some paladins (out of character of course 8)) i get the
impression that they have the same problem. maybe a low hit rate is a payoff
the two classes have to make for having other powerful abilities?
